**Government Tender Announcement**
==============================

**Title / Titre**
----------------

* EC095-230023 RMSO Bread and Rolls / OCPR Pain et petits pains
* Reference Number / N° de Référence: WS4085764426-Doc4155661007

**Tender Details / Détails du Marché**
-----------------------------------

* Solicitation Number / Nº de sollicitation: WS4085764426
* Tender Closing Date / Date limite pour soumission: 2023-08-25T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date / Date prévue de début du contrat: 2023-09-01
* Expected Contract End Date / Date prévue de fin du contrat: 2023-07-31

**Description / Description**
---------------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Atlantic Region, on behalf of various government departments, is seeking a Regional Master Standing Offer for the supply, delivery, and off-loading of various quantities of fresh bread, rolls, and miscellaneous other bakery products on an “as-and-when requested basis” for the period of the Standing Offer from September 1, 2023 to July 31, 2024.

**Contract Information / Informations sur le contrat**
------------------------------------------------

* Contracting Entity / Vendeur: PWGSC, Atlantic Region
* Address / Adresse: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada
* Contact / Contacts:
	+ Andrew MacFarlane (SPAC/PWGSC)
	+ [andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tendering Documents / Documents de marches**
-------------------------------------------

All tendering documents can be downloaded from the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17222673?extsite=MTcyMjI2NzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Response Frequency / Fréquence des invités**
-----------------------------------------

Itinerant buyers will be required to provide the Government of Canada with the number of supplies at the delivery locations as requested by the Government.

Note: Do not answer to this post. It is just a test.
